p0_recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'delivery performance' (výkonnost dodávek) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
p0_recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'delivery performance (výkonnost dodávek)'. Populate a clear bilingual (EN/CZ) business description, assign a business owner/steward with contact info, set relevant technical links (Unity Catalog table if available), and publish. Run Collibra → Unity Catalog sync so the asset appears in the catalog used by consumers.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: Removes the P0 block for this business request and enables governance and discovery for delivery performance.

p0_recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'products' (produkty) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
p0_recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'products (produkty)' with a bilingual business description, assign owner/steward, attach examples and primary keys, and publish. Sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: Restores discoverability for product data and satisfies the business request.

p0_recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'purchase orders' (nákupní objednávky) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
p0_recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'purchase orders (nákupní objednávky)' including a business description, owner/steward, and mapping to factv_purchase_order (if that is the technical table). Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: Unblocks business users and links the business term to the technical asset (factv_purchase_order).

p0_recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'suppliers' (dodavatelé) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
p0_recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'suppliers (dodavatelé)' with bilingual description, assign owner/steward, and map to dimv_supplier technical table. Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: Enables supplier data governance and discovery; links business and technical metadata.

p0_recommendations.description: factv_purchase_order shows a 'warning' validation and low articulation (45) — likely missing a complete business description and owner.
p0_recommendations.action: In Collibra, add a clear business description (purpose, key measures, example rows), assign a business owner/steward and contact, and confirm technical metadata (schema, primary keys). Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: +20–30 articulation score; unblocks business use and incident response.

p0_recommendations.description: factv_delivery_performance has a warning and low articulation score; business context or owner is likely missing.
p0_recommendations.action: Add a bilingual business description in Collibra, assign a data owner/steward, include sample queries and consumers, then publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: +20–30 articulation score; improves trust and usability.

p0_recommendations.description: dimv_supplier shows a warning and low articulation; likely missing owner and business description.
p0_recommendations.action: Add a business description in Collibra describing supplier attributes and hierarchy, assign an owner/steward, and sync to Unity Catalog.
p0_recommendations.estimated_impact: +15–25 articulation score; clearer stewardship and easier onboarding.

p0_recommendations.description: dimv_product has a warning and low articulation score; business description or owner is likely missing.
p0_recommendations.action: Add a business description (product hierarchy, common usage), assign business owner/steward in Collibra, and sync to Unity Catalog.
